titleStmt.title: An introduction into phisycke wyth an vniuersal dyet, gathered by Christofer Langton.
titleStmt.author: Langton, Christopher, 1521-1578.

notesStmt.note: Printer's name and place of publication from colophon; publication date conjectured by STC.
Running title reads: Introduction to phisicke.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
